devdoc.author: george baldwin
devdoc.details: Provides versioning for nft content and follows the semantic labeling convention. Each version contains an array of content and content hash pairs as well as a version label. Versions can be added and urls can be updated along with getters to retrieve specific versions and history. Include with `using Versions for Versions.set;`
devdoc.title: A libary for versioning of NFT content and metadata
